record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - March 12, 2008)

[Page: H1606]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks on H.R. 3361.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from North Dakota?
